data.name: Adam The Storyteller
data.detailed_description:
After waking up, Adam discovers himself flying up in the air on a piece of rock towards a mysterious floating island. Meet others sharing the same fate. What connects them all and what secrets mysterious island hides.

Adam The Storyteller is a difficult puzzle game. While the first levels are super easy to complete, further in the game it requires long-term planning of used puzzles. Every few levels new power-up puzzles are introduced along with new game mechanics to rise difficulty and challenge players. The game requires a lot of skills to collect all the secrets and beat all the high scores.

Features

  • 100 hand-crafted levels.
  • Intuitive gameplay. Easy to learn but hard to master!
  • Unique and innovative mechanics. Discover and master all the piece placement techniques.

data.short_description: Help Adam to solve puzzles around him after being kidnapped by a mysterious land-grabbing floating island. A hand-drawn puzzle-adventure with funny characters, hundred levels and power-up puzzles with unique abilities that will help You to get through a puzzle maze.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP SP3 / Vista / 7 / 10
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.9 Mavericks or later
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit only
  • Processor: 2,0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
